name: ITRex Group
tagline: Advanced Web, Mobile Apps and Custom Software
description:
ITRex Group is a full-cycle digital product agency offering a comprehensive range of custom software development and consulting services.
 
With over 10 years of hands-on experience under our belt, we are committed to delivering industry-specific solutions to large enterprises and middle market companies. Since 2009 we have delivered more than 300 projects to dozens of our clients including Procter & Gamble, Warner Brothers, Walmart, 21st Century Fox, Dollar Shave Club, Dog Vacay, Dun & Bradstreet, Ebooks, JibJab, to name a few.
 
Working at the intersection of business and technology, our team of top software experts is set to address the most complex business challenges to help scale up or build technical solutions that will bring business value.
 
With 200+ business analysts, project managers, software engineers, solution architects, automated QA engineers, R&D and DevOps specialists in the arsenal, ITRex is capable of providing cross-functional expertise across a wide range of services, particularly: 
Custom Software Development and Consulting
Web Apps Development
iOS, Android, cross-platform mobile development,
R&D
Systems Integration
QA Automation
DevOps
IoT
ML
RPA
Video Streaming
AI
AR/VR
Big Data 
 
To deliver robust digital products that scale with business and help companies meet the challenge of an ever-changing digital business landscape, our software experts are constantly on the lookout for new ways to make the most out of revolutionary technologies. 
 
ITRex is an official member of the Forbes Technology Council 2019.
